analysis.description: lucky9io.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x2d7765c44e44b9ec01d30ea367e8403aa4415cb3.sol#107-118) is declared view but contains assembly code

lucky9io.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2d7765c44e44b9ec01d30ea367e8403aa4415cb3.sol#40-107) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lucky_number % 3 == 0

lucky9io.owner should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x2d7765c44e44b9ec01d30ea367e8403aa4415cb3.sol#30-31)
lucky9io.value should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x2d7765c44e44b9ec01d30ea367e8403aa4415cb3.sol#34-35)
lucky9io.value (/unique_contracts/0x2d7765c44e44b9ec01d30ea367e8403aa4415cb3.sol#34-35) is never used in lucky9io
